name: Masha and the Bear: Climb Racing and Car Games
name_original: Masha and the Bear: Climb Racing and Car Games
description:
🚗 On your marks, get set, go! Your family friends Masha and the Bear invite baby drivers to check out brand new kids racing games! Let’s rise the hill and win the race! Designed specifically for kids free games are waiting for a little champion!🏆

🚙 We created this family challenge just for parents looking for easy racing games for toddlers! This is the “hill racing”-style app for little ones, where your children drive a bike or a car with favorite characters Masha and the Bear! No worries — while a kid drive and plays, child skills (such as concentration and motor skills) are improving automatically!
🚗 If the baby likes beepzz animal cars, check this one too! It’s really funny - there is even ambulance kids can drive! Children like racing games free so much! So parents can have a rest, while their toddler drive kids bus, using honey as a fuel!

🚙 Forest animals need some help! Somebody dropped candies all over the road! The wolves ride an ambulance, Masha and the Bear ride their bikes! Who will collect more? But that wouldn’t be easy - our characters should rise huge hills, move through different obstacles on the road! Little racer can help them find all the sweets! 🎊

🚗 Key features of hill car racing with Masha:
🧒🐻 Family friends from Russian cartoon will guide a child!
🚗🚑🚲 Different vehicles emergency car, push-bicycle and so on. Each vehicle has its own driver and physics!
👦👧 Fun car games for girls, games for boys 5 year olds!
🕹 Variety of levels from super-easy to hard, there is even endless journey whole family can play!
🍬 Collect candies, use honey as fuel, move as far as you can!
🚙 Free racing games for kids - so funny, so easy!
🎯 Kids car games improve a child’s skills!

🧒🐻 If you liked this app, please feel free to check other Masha and Bear games from Indigo Kids!
